issue.title: [CI] Turbodbc integration builds are failing due to use of deprecated/removed APIs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13594](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13594). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See eg https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/3277446055

ARROW-13552 removed some deprecated C++ APIs, and turbodbc was still using some of those. See https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10868/files#r685800679

cc `[~uwe]`
